name: flappy.png
description: After years of hard work, blood, sweat, and tears, we from Tjebbe productions studios games etc. finally releasd our magnum opus. Welcome to flappy.png, the worst flappy bird clone to ever see the light of day. We sp[ent months (seconds) getting the best pictures in exsistence (the first google result) which we "elegantly" put in our hand-crafted game (I followed a tutorial). please have fun! or suffer the consuquences
